        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="65598" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="65598" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.73</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="128">128</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="34"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Racquets</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a fragrance for women and men. <b>Racquets</b> was launched in 2021. Top note is Lemon; middle notes are Guaiac Wood and Ambroxan; base note is Leatherwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"For <strong>Racquets</strong> <strong>Eau de Parfum</strong>, Penhaligon's looked into their classics, colognes and scents that are based on time-honored recipes for bringing the elegance of old money into the world of today. In 1989, the company had launched their <strong>Racquets Formula</strong> fragrance, a chypre cologne with top notes of linden blossom, lavender and geranium, segueing into ylang ylang and cloves in the heart, while the base was laid on a bed of oakmoss, musk and amber. A perfume that brings clarity and tenacity whilst being reassuring in its ease and familiarity, the new Racquets Eau de Parfum has an uplifting sparkling-citrus shine, that takes us to an invigorated, playful state of mind.... Bright lemons bounce, and elegant woods soar... then blend with a leather thats both soft and refined. A new modern interpretation of <strong>Racquets</strong>, an old favourite from the Penhaligons classics library." - a note from the brand.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2326683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326683" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="corvoattano53"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="corvoattano53" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298077">corvoattano53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 18:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One to wear exclusively in the summer, genuinely smells like tennis whites, leather cricket balls, and a wicker basket. Performance is good too. Quite a sophisticated smell too, wouldn't wear it unless there was an occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="2326683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=2326683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323392" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a pretty good lemon citrus fragrance, with a rather unique soft leather twist, and some soft creamy amber. It's better in the opening, before the soft suede-like accord morphs into something like a fuzzy tennis ball. It's been a long time since I tried Soft Lawn by Imaginary Authors,  but going off memory,  this Racquets is more pleasant with less of a tennis olfactory association. But it's been a while. I have plenty of Lemon scents, although the suede/tennis ball facet of Racquets is unique. I'd grab a full bottle only if the price were exceptionally great at a discounter, which isn't likely to happen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="2323392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=2323392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946838" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-07">10/07/23 23:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Iconic Chypre Citrus Very unisex with the nice leatherwood undertones. However I do feel it does have age, and I'd make it a bit less powdery. It does feel like old money, just wish it wasn't an emphasis on the old Definitely better than Chanel No.5, and not a cloying projection Feels like a perfume to do fancy sports in like equestrian or croquetNot my favorite from the Penhaligon's collection, but feels like a worthy mention due to the history of this fragrance, or should I say reviving the past<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
GeminiAriesLeo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1946838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1946838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1840291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Micahcshoemaker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Micahcshoemaker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1840291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1840291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395775">Micahcshoemaker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-23">05/23/23 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a like not a love. The Citrus is bright and lively in the first ten minutes giving way to an avalanche of woods and suede like leather held together by a ton of Ambrox. Similar to Brioni for men and a rather neutered black tie by Alberto Morillas. Dont think this ones sticking around for long considering Penhaligons has a habit of discontinuation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1840291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1840291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689172" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maistylz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maistylz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689172ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689172" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143178">maistylz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-15">11/15/22 16:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Refreshingly different, confident without being showy.<br />
A perfume that is both familiar and inviting while still welcoming change with every new day to come; an aroma so simple yet complex at once - ever-changing just like life itself</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1689172"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1689172#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1665489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665489" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penny4urthoughts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450048"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penny4urthoughts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450048">penny4urthoughts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Most of the time I love citrus perfumes because you normally can't go wrong with a lemon/lime scent. I wish I could love it and add it to my limited perfumes shelf. But this one. This one. Doesn't smell like lemon. It smells like someone tried making lemon tea out of those shitty cheap lemon candies. It smells like detergent. It smells like my goddamn toilet cleaner. It's a true insult to Penhaligon's and their true potential, and only gets worse when you realise that this is probably the best performing frag they've released in the past 20 years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1665489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1665489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1571552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1571552" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentedalterego"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727042.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentedalterego" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1571552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1571552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727042">Scentedalterego</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-26">05/26/22 10:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I havent loved any Penhaligons yet, and this one confirms its just not my esthetic. A quite formal woody lemon perfume, also soapy and powdery. Guaiac wood is prominent here. Comes across classic and formal in a bit a dated way, but this might be intentionally. It has good quality and smells expensive, but I wouldnt get it. <br />
<br />
Havent smelled the OG so cant compare.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1571552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1571552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557136" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hannahwdraws"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hannahwdraws" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557136ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557136" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060">hannahwdraws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ding Dong I finally found a citrus perfume I like! Which might also explain why others aren't as much a fan... My nose prefers unisex, woods, leathers, and musks, I am not a fan of sweet or jammy scents and am very particular about citrus. I think a lot of perfume leans towards orange, or orange blossom for its citrus and this being straight up lemon to your eye upon first spray might be too sharp for some. I'm lucky I guess because this is pure lemon zest to me, not cleaning agent, but like the nature of a lot of citrus top notes it doesn't last very long and mellows out into a wonderful wood and leather heaven. <br />
<br />
The name and affiliated imagery is spot on: tennis outfits so white they're almost glowing bright, shockingly green grass, and a tall glass of the most refreshing lemonade covered in condensation waiting for you just off court. Summery, bright, but I'm sure it will be just as refreshing when I wear it this summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1557136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1557136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1556062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aboutjujulia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aboutjujulia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1556062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1556062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1533568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1533568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baccarat Racquets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baccarat Racquets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241">Baccarat Racquets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-27">03/27/22 16:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Racquets by Penhaligons is simply a phenomenal scent and has become my signature. What makes this truly spectacular is how photorealistic this seems. The wood truly gives the impression of Victorian wood that has been encased in leather and cleaned with lemon, hence the name. The lemon does come through very strong initially but its the dry down you're here for. It is a summer scent at heart, but due to how truly classy this fragrance is, I would recommend for any occasion. The sillage is great and I have recieved many compliments with this fragrance, longevity is around 8-10 hours. Sadly, this fragrance was a limited edition run and is now discontinued, so I would recommend trying to get a bottle sooner rather than later!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1531736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1531736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/958408">stalal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-12">01/12/22 22:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh I love this lemon kick ..  Very tangy and refreshing.. although projection is going down way faster than I like for a 300 AUD  scent<br />
<br />
Comparing it to Bergamote 22 Le Labo and i could pick up leather nuances where B22 is ever so slightly floral . I wouldnt be able to tell the difference i wasn't smelling side by side tbh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1481980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1481980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1445507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1445507" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MarkoPeeko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1359937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MarkoPeeko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Memoir-Man-10145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Memoir Man"title="Memoir Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1445507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1445507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1359937">MarkoPeeko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-13">11/13/21 23:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Big lemon opening. Huge. As harsh as Versace pour Homme. The dry down is beautiful. Wood and leather. Doesnt last too long on my skin. About 5-6 hours. For the price, the performance isnt great. Fantastic frag, but not worth the dollar IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1445507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1445507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1420970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1420970" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="G.o.b."/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047866"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1047866.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="G.o.b." style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1420970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1420970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1047866">G.o.b.</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-02">10/02/21 12:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The loud lemony opening soon gives way to a strong woody leather scent. After an hour or two, as others have said, it takes on an air similar to (but not a dead ringer for) D&amp;G light blue. Vibrant and safe its on the borderline of feminine, but fuck it so am I. It smells expensive and classy and it should do, because it is. (A spritz of Kenzo Pour homme with it blows the October cob webs away and worth every frickin penny)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1420970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1420970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1402754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1402754" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nebularonic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1357011.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nebularonic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1402754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1402754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1357011">Nebularonic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-01">09/01/21 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has a uniqueness to it, but sadly in a very ugly way. It's one of those wear it for yourself kind of perfumes. You won't be getting very many compliments, you've been warned lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1402754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1402754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1396891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1396891" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lwsylvia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378125.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lwsylvia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Pure-Musc-For-Her-53441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Musc For Her"title="Pure Musc For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1396891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1396891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378125">lwsylvia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-22">08/22/21 08:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Racquets has been paired up with the passion in a tennis race, so I imagined it'd be a kind of sporty and refreshing perfume. The opening note of lemon is actually a bit too screechy to me. It's so sharp that it almost smells like some sort of detergent. I had a high hope for it, but it's a bit disappointing in terms of the sharpness, complexity and projection. Not more than half an hour the lemon note goes subtle and the leathery note dominates. It's a kind of neutral leathery note that is not infused with any incense note, which makes it smell young and clean. I somehow detect also some peppery note that makes the middle note more lively. The base note is mainly ambroxan to me, which smells very much a mild mix notes of ocean and wood on my skin. The perfume smells beyond unisex, actually pretty masculine on me. I do use men's perfumes, but I don't think this'd be one that I'm interested to use (again).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1396891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1396891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1394696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1394696" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Faellen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.862923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Faellen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Britney-Spears/Candied-Fantasy-93613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candied Fantasy"title="Candied Fantasy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1394696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1394696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/862923">Faellen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-18">08/18/21 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The lemon note is very clean and chemical at first - like that you'd find in hand soap, or household cleaner. It's very fresh and zingy, with that lovely leather base keeping it mature and sophisticated - and certainly very unisex. It really does remind me of D&amp;G Light Blue on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1394696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1394696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1391942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Somehow unusual combination on paper but sits very good on my skin. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soumy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soumy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356640">Soumy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-29">06/29/21 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hmmm weird one. Very citrusey and lemony as a top note which I didn't mind then it nicely fades away becoming cooler and refreshing. However, on my skin, it turns into a "sheep" smell that's the only thing that comes to my mind (nose rather ha!) .. I'm not sure if the leather is to blame (actually,  I am sure it is because within that sheep smell I can smell cow leather) so as you may have guessed not for me. Might smell different on someone else... shame as if it wasn't for that, I liked it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1367788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1367788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1360967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1360967" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1360967ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1360967" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-16">06/16/21 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this. It's a strong leather which isn't a note I'm overly familiar with. At first, there is a balance of lemon and leather but after an hour the lemon fades and the leather remains. It lasts forever even after I had a shower about 9 hours after I applied it I could smell it slightly. Not unpleasant but I'm not a big fan of the leather so I wouldn't buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1360967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1360967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1360860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1360860" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shs111"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351592"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1351592.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shs111" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1360860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1360860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1351592">shs111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-16">06/16/21 07:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought the description sounded interesting and ordered it without smelling it first (there are no stores here in the States, or at least not in my area). So yes, I took the risk. And I really like it. It does have a range of scents (from initial to dry down), and I liked each. I understand why some feel that the initial scent is not to their liking, I didn't have a problem with it. I am glad I bought it, and look forward to wearing it. It definitely feels like a summer fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1360860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1360860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1357761" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1357761" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nick68"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nick68" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Habit-Rouge-Rouge-Prive-80690.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80690.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Habit Rouge Rouge Priv"title="Habit Rouge Rouge Priv"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1357761ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1357761" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257270">Nick68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-10">06/10/21 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this in the recent Penhaligons offer in the UK. <br />
<br />
Its going to have mixed reviews. <br />
<br />
A friend at work had his delivery the day before mine and his reviews were mixed, he thought it was ok, his wife hated it thinking it gave off the hint of body odour and his daughter absolutely loved it. <br />
<br />
The initial hit I got this morning was of a heavy almost chemical  lemon smell. I sniffed my arm about 5 minutes later and right at the end I did get that faint hint of body odour my friends wife mentioned. <br />
<br />
It mellowed quickly but theres no great projection or longevity, Ive only got the faintest hint of it throughout the day. Its OK but hard to believe its a EDP. <br />
<br />
76 for this and the free 75ml of Monsieur Beauregard was acceptable. 76 for 30ml of this alone and I would be seriously disappointed. <br />
<br />
This is the first full bottle from Penhaligons Ive not loved, and Ive blind bought quite a few.  Part of me does wonder who they sampled this on to think it was up to their usual standard. <br />
<br />
Not their best and I cant see it standing the test of time in their range.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1357761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1357761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356904" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356904" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="two_seven_three"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349025"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="two_seven_three" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356904ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356904" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349025">two_seven_three</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-09">06/09/21 01:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Penhaligon's take on Mancera Cedrat Boisee and, to a lesser extent, Creed Aventus. I have all three on me now and the similarities are striking, particularly in the dry down. In the opening, Racquets differentiates itself with a very punchy lemon note and is more citrusy than Cedrat Boisee. Aventus' Smokey Pineapple is more appealing than both the other two but the vibe is the same. In the dry down Cedrat and Racquets are near enough identical for me, with a slightly leathery, transparent woody feel and a touch of the citrus still detectable. Performance on both is also very similar, that is to say OK (3-4 hours). For me, although I do enjoy Racquets the early impressions are a little disappointing. I like it but it's not a standout fragrance that I will really crave I don't think. I do tend to warm to fragrances over time so I may update this in a few weeks.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1356904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1356904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354403" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentMonster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1198405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1198405.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentMonster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Parfum-Cologne-46296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"title="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354403ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354403" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1198405">ScentMonster</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-04">06/04/21 10:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Women's D&amp;G Light Blue on dry down. Lasts forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1354403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1354403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1353799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1353799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blowfishes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/992919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.992919.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blowfishes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rogue-Perfumery/Mousse-Illuminee-53821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mousse Illuminee"title="Mousse Illuminee"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1353799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1353799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/992919">Blowfishes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-03">06/03/21 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like Orto Parisi Bergamask, Hanae Mori HM, or Lemon by Mary Greenwell, then you will enjoy Racquets EDP by Penhaligon's.<br />
<br />
Starts with a huge blast of citronella, but this warms when a herbaceous note joins the fray. This continues for the first hour and the the lemon takes a backseat to a musk.<br />
<br />
It is a simple fragrance that has been very well executed. At each stage I can only compare it to Bergamask, as it resembles that fragrances right through the drydown. It isn't as loud as the Orto Parisi, but it certainly stands proud alongside it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1353799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1353799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1349113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1349113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1349113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1349113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-25">05/25/21 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad, not great either. Probably one of the few of Penhaligons that Im not really keen on. <br />
<br />
The initial spray starts off smelling like McDonalds hand soap in the 90s and early 2000s. The initial spray is very zesty and fresh that smells like cheap hand wash from McDonalds when I was a youngster from what I can remember. <br />
<br />
The dry down is okay, fairly woody but also very synthetic. Longevity and sillage is satisfactory. This smells very much Hermes Citron Noir which I own. Only the latter being much more woody. <br />
<br />
Not for me. 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1349113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1349113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1343756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1343756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smurfygurly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/674398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.674398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smurfygurly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Cherie-213.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.213.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Cherie"title="Miss Dior Cherie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1343756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1343756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/674398">smurfygurly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-15">05/15/21 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts very promising with a beautiful zingy natural lemon, however the dry down is dominated by ambroxan, a note of which Im not a fan. I wonder who the perfumer is, cant find that out anywhere, maybe Morillas as a lot of his work seems to be structured this way. Only tested on paper (I dont like to put ambroxan on my skin as it irritates the  out of me).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1343756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1343756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1341894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1341894" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tarantella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1258975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tarantella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Dom-Rosa-23083.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23083.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dom Rosa"title="Dom Rosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1341894ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1341894" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1258975">Tarantella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-12">05/12/21 02:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous scent! So fresh, citrusy and woody. Wood has a hint of smoke and it sounds lovely. 100% unisex! Lemon gives freshness and ambroxan is responsible for lightly warm notes here. Great job, Penhaligons!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1341894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1341894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1340923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xanovia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.208914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xanovia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/To-My-Father-77113.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77113.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="To My Father"title="To My Father"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1340923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1340923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208914">Xanovia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-10">05/10/21 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a sample of this coming fresh from Penhaligon's and I am really looking forward to smelling it... I'll update once I have the opportunity to wear it a few times... ^_^<br />
---<br />
Updated: I've finished off my two samples and I gotta say I really enjoy it for Spring and Summer... So much so that I just ordered a full bottle... Very BRIGHT Lemon note to start you off that then slowly drifts into a leathery woody vibe... Good longevity and does not scream off the skin... My wife also has worn this and it was wonderful on her too... VERY unisex fragrance straight down the line IMO... Looking forward to having this in my collection...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1340923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1340923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
