align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1695342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1695342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baccarat Racquets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baccarat Racquets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476241">Baccarat Racquets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-27">03/27/22 16:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Racquets by Penhaligons is simply a phenomenal scent and has become my signature. What makes this truly spectacular is how photorealistic this seems. The wood truly gives the impression of Victorian wood that has been encased in leather and cleaned with lemon, hence the name. The lemon does come through very strong initially but its the dry down you're here for. It is a summer scent at heart, but due to how truly classy this fragrance is, I would recommend for any occasion. The sillage is great and I have recieved many compliments with this fragrance, longevity is around 8-10 hours. Sadly, this fragrance was a limited edition run and is now discontinued, so I would recommend trying to get a bottle sooner rather than later!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1531736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1531736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557136" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557136" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hannahwdraws"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241060.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hannahwdraws" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557136ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557136" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241060">hannahwdraws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ding Dong I finally found a citrus perfume I like! Which might also explain why others aren't as much a fan... My nose prefers unisex, woods, leathers, and musks, I am not a fan of sweet or jammy scents and am very particular about citrus. I think a lot of perfume leans towards orange, or orange blossom for its citrus and this being straight up lemon to your eye upon first spray might be too sharp for some. I'm lucky I guess because this is pure lemon zest to me, not cleaning agent, but like the nature of a lot of citrus top notes it doesn't last very long and mellows out into a wonderful wood and leather heaven. <br />
<br />
The name and affiliated imagery is spot on: tennis outfits so white they're almost glowing bright, shockingly green grass, and a tall glass of the most refreshing lemonade covered in condensation waiting for you just off court. Summery, bright, but I'm sure it will be just as refreshing when I wear it this summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1557136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1557136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1382710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1343756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smurfygurly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/674398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.674398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smurfygurly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Cherie-213.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.213.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Cherie"title="Miss Dior Cherie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1343756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1343756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); I wonder who the perfumer is, cant find that out anywhere, maybe Morillas as a lot of his work seems to be structured this way. Only tested on paper (I dont like to put ambroxan on my skin as it irritates the  out of me).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1343756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1343756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1946838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; However I do feel it does have age, and I'd make it a bit less powdery. It does feel like old money, just wish it wasn't an emphasis on the old Definitely better than Chanel No.5, and not a cloying projection Feels like a perfume to do fancy sports in like equestrian or croquetNot my favorite from the Penhaligon's collection, but feels like a worthy mention due to the history of this fragrance, or should I say reviving the past<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
GeminiAriesLeo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1946838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1946838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1556062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aboutjujulia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aboutjujulia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1556062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1556062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112564">aboutjujulia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-03">05/03/22 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The sharp lemon scent makes my teeth get sensitive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1556062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1556062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1665489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1665489" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penny4urthoughts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450048"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penny4urthoughts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1665489ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1665489" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1450048">penny4urthoughts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-13">10/13/22 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Most of the time I love citrus perfumes because you normally can't go wrong with a lemon/lime scent. I wish I could love it and add it to my limited perfumes shelf. But this one. This one. Doesn't smell like lemon. It smells like someone tried making lemon tea out of those shitty cheap lemon candies. It smells like detergent. It smells like my goddamn toilet cleaner. It's a true insult to Penhaligon's and their true potential, and only gets worse when you realise that this is probably the best performing frag they've released in the past 20 years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1665489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1665489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1367788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Soumy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Soumy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1356640">Soumy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-29">06/29/21 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hmmm weird one. Very citrusey and lemony as a top note which I didn't mind then it nicely fades away becoming cooler and refreshing. However, on my skin, it turns into a "sheep" smell that's the only thing that comes to my mind (nose rather ha!) .. I'm not sure if the leather is to blame (actually,  I am sure it is because within that sheep smell I can smell cow leather) so as you may have guessed not for me. Might smell different on someone else... shame as if it wasn't for that, I liked it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65598"comment_id="1367788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Racquets-65598.html?ccid=1367788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="65598" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="65598":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="65598" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>

              tabindex="1" title="Opening is a bit damp. You dont feel much citrus or sharp ginger notes at the opening. Develops to floral notes after a while. Sweet on the floral side. After a while it dries down to sweet vanilla. You can feel the dominant sandalwood note too.">by
            <em>itsabhi</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.2026950.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>

            <div class="sticky"
                 data-sticky
                 style="margin-left: -0.65rem; margin-top: 2rem;"
                 data-top-anchor="anchormehere45646:bottom"

                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>
</div>

                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
